hero_bg.alt: Abstract Cyberpunk Blue Light Security Background
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (opacity-90)

structure: Hero: Dark Navy, 'Secure Your Enterprise Future', CTA: 'Request Demo'
Problem/Agitation: 'The Attack Surface is Growing' (White bg)
CTA: 'Ready to secure your infrastructure?' (Dark Navy)

products.layout: Grid of cards, each linking to detail page. Use abstract tech images as card headers.

product_detail.layout: Sticky sidebar nav for long content. Deep dive into features. Use 'Check' icons for capabilities.

contact.layout: Split screen. Left: Contact Info & Trust signals. Right: Multi-step form.

universal_guidelines: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings to give a modern tech feel.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Primary CTA buttons must always be the 'Accent' color (#0EA5E9) or White on dark backgrounds.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617) for dark backgrounds.
Use the 'grid' texture background on white sections to add technical depth.
Ensure all forms have proper validation and error states.
Implement 'lucide-react' icons for all UI iconography.
